name: ScepticDope's Blackhole
description:
Sprint, Jump and Slide as Maia or Damian through a series of puzzling levels that all lead to the mysterious black hole!

P1 (Keyboard, Device0):

  • Movement: A/D, X Axis
  • Start/Stop Slide: S/W, Y Axis
  • Jump: Space, A button
  • Sprint: Shift, R2
  • Zoom-out: Q, L2
  • Reset Level: R, D-Pad-Left

P2 (Keyboard, Device1):

  • Movement: ←/→, X Axis
  • Start/Stop Slide: ↓/↑, Y Axis
  • Jump: Space, A button
  • Sprint: /, R2
  • Zoom-out: ', L2
  • Reset Level: R, D-Pad-Left

Misc:

  • Open Main Menu: Escape
  • Pause Game: Pause Key
  • Toggle-Fullscreen: Alt+Enter

Used Godot Engine:

3.1.1 Mono 2fbc421

Participation Level:

First time jammer, first game I ever created!

Source:

I might share the source with other Jammers on Discord. No existing code, visuals or audio used. Everything in the game was created during the jam.
